Building any vehicle with multiple stages is challenging enough. When I place any thruster or mono propellant device on something, say a satellite payload, the thrusters will activate outside of their designated stage and either make the payload unstable during initial flight or the Auto-correction mechanisms will go crazy resulting in loss of control of the vehicle at some point on occasion. My suggestion to fix this is to change the coding to make them be off initially requiring either a stage activation or manual activation once the user is ready to use the control device. Thanks

Sailor Zen
Moved to Suggestions and Development Discussion

RCS ports work independent on staging. I believe you can toggle them using action groups, though, if you feel it's necessary.

Engines can be assigned to their appropriate stages in VAB/SPH.
I will definitely give that a try! I've been a little intimidated by the Action Group Mode.
